mapper.insert: insert all into document values(#{doc_id},2,#{emp_id},#{doc_type_id}, #{doc_subject},#{doc_content},#{doc_date},sysdate+7,#{doc_open}, #{doc_dep_id},#{doc_note}) into btrip_report values(#{exepense_info_id},#{doc_id},#{start_date}, #{end_date},#{btrip_location}) into btrip_payment values(SEQ_DOC_EXP_SEQ.nextval,#{exepense_info_id}, #{exp_daily},#{exp_room},#{exp_food},#{exp_trans}, #{exp_etc},#{exp_total} )
mapper.select: select d.doc_id, d.doc_status_id, d.emp_id, d.doc_type_id, d.doc_subject, d.doc_content, d.doc_date, d.doc_deadline, d.doc_open, d.doc_dep_id, d.doc_note, dt.doc_type_name, ds.doc_status_name, e.emp_name, dp.dep_name, r.expense_info_id, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.btrip_location from document d, employee e, department dp, doc_type dt, doc_status ds, btrip_report r where d.emp_id = e.emp_id and e.dep_id = dp.dep_id and d.doc_type_id = dt.doc_type_id and d.doc_status_id = ds.doc_status_id and d.doc_id = r.doc_id and d.doc_id = #{doc_id}
